title: Escape to Witch Mountain
creator_credit: John Hough, Jerome Courtland and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Two orphans develop telekinetic powers and escape from exploitative adults with the aid of a grieving widow. They retreat to Witch Mountain, discovering their powers, which include predicting the future, levitating objects and mastery over animals. This extremely popular family oriented children’s film features Eddie Albert, Ray Milland, and Donald Pleasence, with Kim Richards and Ike Eisenmann, playing the imperilled children.
